p: In scenario S2, the southern regions were represented within the ‘best’ reserve design output as two large sanctuary zones with all additional zones increasing the current no-take sanctuary area by 320.2 km 2 (12.1%) ( Fig 5A). When the resilience features were added (scenario S4), the ‘best’ reserve design was very similar to the output of S2, however, there was one major addition to the sanctuary zone network offshore from Coral Bay which resulted in a further increase in sanctuary zone area of 197.6 km 2 ( Fig 5B). The Marxan ‘best’ outputs for both scenarios also added the existing shore-based activity special purpose zones (narrow shore-side strips) to the no-take sanctuary network ( Fig 5A & 5B).
